recipes.title: Herb Roasted Chicken with Provence Herbs
recipes.excerpt: A classic family dish, this herb roasted chicken is juicy and fragrant.
recipes.introduction: Roast chicken is a Sunday family staple.
recipes.conclusion: Serve this chicken with roasted potatoes and a green salad.

instructions.tip: Take the chicken out of the refrigerator 30 minutes before for even cooking.

instructions.content: Mix the olive oil with the Provence herbs, salt and pepper.
Brush the chicken with this mixture, inside and out.
instructions.tip: Feel free to slide some butter under the skin for extra moisture.

instructions.content: Place the garlic and half lemon inside the chicken cavity.
Arrange the vegetables around the chicken in an oven-safe dish.
Roast for 1 hour 15 minutes, basting regularly with the cooking juices.
instructions.tip: Baste every 20 minutes for a golden, crispy skin.

instructions.content: Check doneness by piercing the thigh - the juices should run clear.
Let rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.
instructions.tip: Resting allows the juices to redistribute throughout the meat.

recipes.faq:
Can I prepare the chicken ahead of time?

Yes, you can season the chicken the day before and keep it refrigerated. Take it out 30 minutes before cooking.
